content: As they watch the movie, Tim takes note of how the soft light from the screen highlights Samantha's features in an innocent way. He observes how the light accentuates the contours of her body, casting a warm glow on her skin. He notices how the light seems to make her look even more beautiful, and how it brings out the details of her intimate areas. He thinks about how comfortable she looks, sprawled out on the couch next to him, and how natural it feels to have her there, naked and at ease. He reflects on how innocent and pure this moment is, and how much he enjoys spending time with her in this way.
